title: LF PLAT SUPP [ADC PLAT 3 LAST SEASON]

embed.description: TheGawdDiablo / Platinum 5 50LP / 51W 42L Win Ratio 55% / Jhin - 16W 8L Win Ratio 67%, Twitch - 4W 8L Win Ratio 33%, Jinx - 5W 5L Win Ratio 50%, Varus - 3W 6L Win Ratio 33%, Lux - 5W 3L Win Ratio 63%

body:
Hi, my ign is TheGawdDiablo and im looking for a supp.
I picked plat 1 last season, and currently i im plat 5 with good mmr
usually get 26lp and lose 14.
I like to plat {{champion:202}}  {{champion:51}} usually play meta or champs  i know i can do good.
Im looking for a supp who plays {{champion:12}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:40}} pretty much or strong supp in the meta c: thanks
